findings.title: ST - Stop Transactions
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to stop contracts from transactions.

findings.title: Contract Reverts in Small Amounts
findings.description: The contract has a hard limit of 10 * 10**decimals(). The contract is able to stop the transactions if the user’s balance is less than the hard limit. As a result, the transaction will underflow.

findings.title: OCTD - Owner Contract Tokens Drain
findings.description: Contract Owner is not able to transfer tokens from specific address

findings.title: ELFM - Exceed Limit Fees Manipulation
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to increase over the allowed limit of 25%. The owner may take advantage of it by calling the setTaxes, setSellTaxes function with a high percentage value.

findings.title: ULTW - Unlimited Liquidity to Team Wallet
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to transfer funds without limit to the team wallet, which can lead to price volatility and potential abuse.

findings.title: BC - Blacklisted Contracts
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to stop contracts from transactions by calling updateIsBCheck and BCheck functions, allowing them to massively blacklist addresses.

findings.title: ZD - Zero Division
findings.description: Performing divisions may cause zero division issues.

findings.title: STC - Succeeded Transfer Check
findings.description: The contract should check if the result of the transfer methods is successful.

findings.title: L01 - Public Function could be Declared External
findings.description: Public functions that are never called by the contract should be declared external to save gas.
findings.function: excludeFromFee, name, includeInFee, allowance, approve, symbol, setSellTaxes, isExcludedFromReward, transferOwnership

findings.title: L02 - State Variables could be Declared Constant
findings.description: Constant state variables should be declared constant to save gas.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: Solidity defines a naming convention that should be followed.

findings.title: L07 - Missing Events Arithmetic
findings.description: Detected missing events for critical arithmetic parameters. There are functions that have no event emitted, so it is difficult to track off-chain changes.
